plugins.name: jaan-to
plugins.description: AI-powered plugin with 29 skills for product management, development, UX research, QA testing, data analytics, and evidence-based repo audits. Generate PRDs, user stories, task breakdowns, scaffolds, data models, API contracts, frontend components, test cases, GTM tracking, and run detect suite (dev, design, writing, product, UX + knowledge pack). Features: two-phase workflow with human approval, quality-reviewer agent, context-scout agent, LEARN.md continuous improvement system.
